name: Murder Dog IV: Trial Of The Murder Dog
name_original: Murder Dog IV: Trial Of The Murder Dog
description:
Murder Dog is on trial in the Hague for crimes against humanity! Can you help him beat the rap and continue his reign of blood? Multiple endings.

Originally released August 2011. Made in Adventure Game Studio. Runs best in compatability mode for Windows XP.

Many thanks to whoever it was who made the Mac port some years back - unable to test if it works with newer OS builds.

Controls:
Mouse for clicking.
